erebe/wstunnel

tunnel any traffic over websockets to bypass firewalls and proxies

Related repos

  • Exposes local HTTP and WebSocket services to the internet
  • Proxy server for HTTP, SOCKS5, TCP, UDP, and more — works on lots of platforms
  • Application firewall for Linux systems
  • WebSocket server in Rust with Pusher protocol, handles 100K+ connections, Redis/NATS support, Prometheus metrics
  • Lets you set up secure tunnels and proxy servers with support for HTTP, HTTPS, SOCKS5, Shadowsocks, and more protocols
  • Remote system monitor with a TUI over WebSockets
  • Proxy client for internet access across platforms
  • WebSocket server for Claude Agent SDK in E2B sandboxes
  • Self-hosted tunnel to expose localhost through own infrastructure
